subject: Re: Duracube Website Project Page – New image size

full_threads.body:
Hi Belinda, 

Thanks, confirming the most recent round of updates has been completed: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/
Hi @joel we have received some further updates from the client, can you please review and action the attached?

Hi Chris,

Please see the 2 attachments with the amendments for the Duracube Project page and contact me if you require any clarification.

Kind Regards,

Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist



13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au

End of Year Closure: Last day is 20th December 2023. Reopen on 8th January 2024.

Hi Belinda, 

Confirming we have completed the following updates on the page: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/

1. Adjust the product category sort to reflect the requested order.

2. Adjust the text sizing to reduce heading and increase sub-items. 

3. Adjust the order in which the featured products appear below the project heading. 

Please review and let us know if there are any further updates.

@joel can you please take a look at this ticket?
Specifically the order of the "product category" sort found on: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/

the client would like it to be in the order found on: https://duracube.com.au/projects/ (instead of alphabetical)

Hi @glen we can tackle this after Argyle Hire, thanks!

The order refers to the product sort found on https://duracube.com.au/projects/

Hi Chris,

Regarding our phone call this morning about the amendments to the Duracube Projects website page please complete the below tasks.

When the design for the Projects is approved, you can proceed to update all the existing projects to the new style.

1. Please arrange the text into the order that is on the website now.


Change the above text to the text below - Same Text and Same Order.[img width="0" height="0" class="c5">

<img alt="Current top text layout.png" width="541" height="115"]https://d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/inline/87172/f2d37a35661e11426c33ff1c99d1886b1b52605e/178027f4a96e30cb7d5fb20f386105afc40338f7/Current-top-text-layout.png[/img]



Please contact me if you require additional information about the above tasks.

Kind Regards,

Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist



13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au

End of Year Closure: Last day is 20th December 2023. Reopen on 8th January 2024.

Hi Belinda, 

We can tackle it in your order of preference. Would you prefer we tackle the transfer of projects first?

In regards to our meeting, I'm not sure there is a need for one just yet.

Hi Chris,

Can you please reduce the blue heading size by 2pts.

If it is easy to change the blue heading because it is in a style sheet, you can change it after you have transferred all the projects to the new layout.

I scheduled a meeting for tomorrow but we can cancel it if we don't need it.

Kind Regards,

Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist



13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au

End of Year Closure: Last day is 20th December 2023. Reopen on 8th January 2024.

Hi Belinda, 

Noted, please supply us with the 2 case studies and we can upload them and adjust text as requested. 

We expect to each project to take 15 mins to transfer.

Hi Chris,

Thank you, they are looking good. 👍

Just wondering if the blue project names should be a little smaller and the product systems text a little bigger or bolder. I would like to see a trial one first before you do all of them.

I have been told to give you two more project case studies to upload ASAP which I am working on now.

How long do you think it would take for the existing projects to be updated to the new layout?

I'm going into a meeting now.

Kind Regards,

Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist



13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au

End of Year Closure: Last day is 20th December 2023. Reopen on 8th January 2024.
+15 mins added to harvest and closed.

Hi Belinda, 

We have updated the featured images. Please see the updated projects page here: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/

Please review and let us know if there are any further changes.

done updating the images for the 3 projects

10mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Rika,

Please see below task for Glen to assist with.

Hi Chris,

Thank you for your time this afternoon. As discussed attached are the new feature images in the 800px x 600px (2048px x 1536px) proportions for upload to the Projects page.

Kind Regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist


13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750
